description:
Alec is a midwestern boy – just the right balance between country and city. He’s former military with chiseled features, a super tight, ripped body, great abs and nice defined arms. He works out about five days a week and maintains a pretty strict diet. But, he’s not afraid to indulge in a pizza every once in a while, either.
Something really sexy about Alec is his personality. He’s very polite, not so much for small talk, answers questions succinctly and still has a very military-like demeanor.
But, when the clothes come off, it’s a whole different Alec. His cock gets rock hard, and when it’s hard it curves up and slightly left. As he’s jacking off, he’s intensely focused on his cock, stroking slowly, then quick, then slow, then quick.
He's a big music aficionado, but there is one genre he really loves.
“I’m really into old-school classic rock music from the 60s, 70s and 80s,” he said without hesitation...
title: Alec
